entries.name: sept22-connections-workshop
entries.header: September 2022 Scivision Connections Workshop: Flower and Butterfly Classification
entries.description: PhD candidates attended a workshop at The Alan Turing Institute to get some hands-on experience working on scivision as a piece of research software. The task involved adding pre-trained models and datasources to the scivision catalog. Succesful submissions include two classification models, for flowers and butterflies, and related datasets.
